page.title: 01East Burgess Hill
page.content: The{east side}of Burgess Hill is taken up by the{Folders Lane Estate and the{Inholmes Estate,}both of which are new. There are three schools in the area. They are{Birchwood Grove Primary {School, Newick House Special School} and{Manor Field Primary School.} { The Keymer Tile Company}has been going for one hundred years. Because of the brick and tile industry, Burgess Hill became a town.{ There are many farms in east Burgess Hill. Much of the land is rough pasture. There are some fields of crops near Streat. On the edge of{Ditchling Common}there is a small vineyard. Part of the Common is a Country Park.
